name: Ninjas vs Samurais Card Chronicles: Blades of the Shinigami
name_original: Ninjas vs Samurais Card Chronicles: Blades of the Shinigami
description:
Ninjas vs Samurais Card Chronicles: Katana no ha Shinigami, combines roguelike, deck building and strategy to create a story driven JRPG card battler; consisting of thrilling adventures, exciting challenges & strategic gameplay, that can be enjoyed single player or in epic duels of wits, Tactics, & strategy against other players online.





Inspired by games such as Hearthstone, Slay the spire, Mortal Kombat, & classic JRPGs, in Ninja Vs Samurai single player stories, set off on an adventure with unique heroes, putting your skills & deck to the test, in stories inspired by battles & heroes of futile Japan & Japanese myths & legends, that delivers a twisted and gripping narrative filled with tragedy, death, betrayal, and redemption.

Created to feel more like a fighting or JRPG game, in conjunction with highly detailed, cards, characters & environments, alongside cameras & cinematography that force you to feel every strike, this game is set to deliver a stylish blend of action, deck-building, & turn-based tactics.





Ninja vs Samurai Card Chronicles is a single & player vs player digital card battler & collection rouge-lite, but unlike many of the other games in this genre, much like a fighting game, Ninja vs Samurai uses a class & faction based system, assuring that no matter your play style, you’ll find characters & cards that works best for your style of play. Additionally, unlike most card battlers, the fast pace & responsive combat system of the combat, gives this game a truly unique look & feel.

Ninja vs Samurai Card Chronicles consist of 4 factions each with their own unique set of cards, skills, & characters.

The Hachiman-Jin Samurai - This deck consists of strong attack & defensive cards. In conjunction with counter attack & perries, these skill swordsmen effortlessly negate or deflect any damage that may come their way.

The Shinigami Ninjas - As masters of shadows & stealth, the Ninjas deck relies on subterfuge. With their unique ability to poison, immobilize, & weaken their opponents attack & defenses, they can easily deal with even the strongest of swordsmen.

The Ronin - These samurai who answer only to themselves, are enemies to bothe Hachiman-Jin & Shinigami alike. As such, in their travels they’ll face both samurai & ninjas. However, with their origin as Samurai, they have access to the samurai deck as well as their own unique cards which can take advantage of many of the ninjas techniques as well.

Rogue Ninja - These ninja hold allegiance to no clan, and consider both Samurai & ninja as enemies. Like the Ronin, their original teachings give them access to the ninja deck as well as their own unique deck & cards.

Lastly, there are special guest characters. These characters were created from direct inspiration from popular anime, shows, & games, with cards, moves, & fighting styles that will directly represent their inspiration.
